title: FS/FT: Graded Charlie Rhodes Portrait EPDG - SOLD

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Graded Charlie Rhodes Portrait EPDG - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Have a dupe available.  Charlie Rhodes EPDG grade PSA 1mk with a cool backstamp of LEO AMISS BROS.

Asking $SOLD shipped. Will listen to offers including trades.

First to say “I’ll take it” gets priority over any negotiations. Paypal friends please.
